metadata.title: CVE-2016-2781 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: chroot in GNU coreutils, when used with --userspec, allows local users toescape to the parent session via a crafted TIOCSTI ioctl call, which pushescharacters to the terminal's input buffer.

criterions.comment: coreutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
